text:
Re Kelly; I’m with <@U0135SLHQBW> on that one. As I’m in play only, I have my own version of Kelly ie it performs the same function BUT it only applies it on the fly on races where I believe I have a bigger edge. It recirculates some of the profits back in, in real time. 
On the odd occasion it triggers you can have some spectacular results
So you don’t think you need to think of a Kelly like principle as a binary, you can choose when and if to use it.
I’ve named this system ‘my ratchet system’ :smile:
